narrative:
This was a prelicense inspection for a Class C Exhibitor license. 
No regulated animals on the premise. The animals seen during this inspection were squirrels and opossums that
were being rehabbed. This facility is planning to acquire a non-releasable opossum to be used for exhibition. 
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
An application fee of $30 will need to be submitted to the Regional Office: 
USDA - APHIS - Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr - Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
